oResource.common.footer.title: Knowledge and science pertain solely to Allah, the All-Pervading One, the Vast, the All-Embracing, and the Knowledgeable Almighty. No one can intercede within his knowledge. All praise to Allah first and foremost and final, for not adding or diminishing certainty from his knowledge, the Omnipotent.
oResource.error.common.cookies.acceptcokies: Warning: Some  features on this site may not be available to you since your browser doesn't accept cookies. Please enable cookies to enjoy the full features of this site.
oResource.error.common.date.invalid.hijri: Invalid Hijri date, please enter a date between Muharram 1, 1 and Thul-Hijja 30, 1500 H.
oResource.error.common.date.invalid.gregorian: Invalid Gregorian date, please enter a date between July 16, 622 CE and November 16, 2077 CE.
oResource.error.common.javascript.fullScreen: Your browser is currently configured not to allow window resizing and moving, enable these features to view this window in full screen.
oResource.label.common.preferencesDisplayingSearch: Use my preferences to displaying search results?
oResource.error.common.nofont.Quran_me: Error: This site requires that you have the font “Quran_me” installed on your system. Please click here to find out more.
oResource.common.besmiAllay.lang: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
oResource.error.common.javascript.enable: Warning: Some features on this site may not be available and  some pages may not display properly because your browser does not support JavaScript or it is disabled. Please enable JavaScript to enjoy the full functionality of this site.
oResource.common.title: We have, without doubt, sent down the Quran; and We will assuredly guard it (from corruption).
